messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Okita fanart
messages.msgSnippet: ... Both pics are very nice -- I like the posture and proportions particularly on the first.  If your daughter is artistically inclined, I have a few
messages.messageBody:
At 12:58 PM 4/18/2004 -0400, you wrote:
>Just wanted to share a bit of my daughter's artwork. She tells me it's
>her vision of the historical Okita.
>
><http://www.barbarasheridan.net/okita.htm>http://www.barbarasheridan.net/okita.htm


Both pics are very nice -- I like the posture and proportions particularly on the first. If your daughter is artistically inclined, I have a few suggestions for where she could get more feedback from other anime-artists.

And I know most of you have already seen the very little Saitou stuff I have (since I am certain I posted it to some of the other lists), but here's a little quick oekaki I did a while back of youknowwho^_^

http://www.hakubaikou.com/contributors/sherlgirl/185.jpg

S-girl
s-girl.deviantart.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Okita fanart
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to share a bit of my daughter s artwork. She tells me it s her vision of the historical Okita. http://www.barbarasheridan.net/okita.htm -- Barbara
